mapper.select: SELECT 'W' || LEVEL CODE_ID, 'W' || LEVEL CODE_NAME FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 4
mapper.update: MERGE INTO LOG0119M A USING ( SELECT #{branchCode} as WH_LOC_CODE , #{stkCode} as STK_CODE , #{safetyQty} as SAFETY_QTY , #{userId} as USER_ID FROM DUAL ) SRC ON ( A.WH_LOC_CODE = SRC.WH_LOC_CODE AND A.STK_CODE = SRC.STK_CODE) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET A.SAFETY_QTY = SRC.SAFETY_QTY , A.UPD_USER_ID = SRC.USER_ID , A.UPD_DT = SYSDATE WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( WH_LOC_CODE , STK_CODE , SAFETY_QTY , DISAB , CRT_USER_ID , CRT_DT ) VALUES ( SRC.WH_LOC_CODE , SRC.STK_CODE , SRC.SAFETY_QTY , 0 , SRC.USER_ID , SYSDATE )
